main.name: Jake Myers
main.description: I love to explore new technologies and strive to be a difference maker in every situation i'm in
main.bio: I was raised in Huntington Woods, Michigan, and have been working with computers ever since my parents brought home a computer running Windows XP. Since then a lot has changed (I prefer a unix-based OS), and my passion for computers and technology has only grown stronger. Being a self taught DJ and Graphic Designer, combined with graduating college with a degree in computer science has really provided me with a vast set of skills. And I aim to use those skills each and every day to try and make an impact in the world.
main.contactmessage: If you'd like to get in touch with me, feel free to email me at my address listed below. Or just use this form!

resume.skillmessage: Here's a scrollable list of technologies I've enjoyed working with!

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Led development of Google API for integration of consumer brokerage services portal with Google Assistant, increasing accessibility and functionality of product
work.description2: Collaborated with 2-person team in development of 2 applications, a video livestream and media player and one with CarPlay functionality, with focus on applications’ UX/UI, allowing consumers to access TD Ameritrade Network on mobile devices
work.description3: Created content management system for company’s internal blog site, improving platform and functionality while maintaining existing content
work.description4: Presented to company’s business leaders on importance of recommendation engines and how such engines could be implemented with business processes and frameworks

work.title: Software Engineering & Product Management Intern
work.description: Designed code base foundation to scale order processing system capabilities, increasing daily order capacity from by 400% to accommodate future growth
work.description2: Analyzed finite state machine to implement order pickup option, streamlining processes and reducing redundancies within current states

work.title: Camp Counselor
work.description: Designed code base foundation to scale order processing system capabilities, increasing daily order capacity from by 400% to accommodate future growth
work.description2: Analyzed finite state machine to implement order pickup option, streamlining processes and reducing redundancies within current states

projects.title: Triple E Professional Learning Network
projects.category: Website built in Angular during my senior year at Michigan as apart of a directed study with multiple professors

projects.title: TD Ameritrdae Network Radio
projects.category: helped develop the TDAN Radio app, which allows iOS users to stream TDAN directly to their phone with full Apple Carplay functionality

projects.title: TD Ameritrdae Network Video
projects.category: helped develop the TDAN Video app, which allows iOS users to stream TDAN directly to their phone

projects.title: STUMPY
projects.category: Worked on TD Ameritrade's open source python library STUMPY, helping develop the algorithm through research & implementation.

testimonials.text: Having Jake on the team is a very positive experience. He has a lot of energy and cares a lot about the quality of his work as well as a desire for his work to be meaningful.
testimonials.user: Chris Melnick, Manager of TD Ameritrade's Exploration Lab

testimonials.text: Jake has always been innovative. At the age of 3 he merged two quotes, "No Problem" and "My Pleasure", to become "No Pleasure".
